Text: Last Minute Holiday Deals at ChaseShopcomCHASE THE RIGHT RELATIONSHIP IS EVERYTHING Dear KIMBERLY WARD Last minute holiday shopping stress Dont worry Take advantage of the store links and hundreds of special offers at ChaseShopcom kc ChaseShopcom is the convenient way to shop for holiday gifts From your favorite brands on the Web and in your neighborhoodwhether youre looking for books music electronics toys or computersyou can find all the presents you need at ChaseShopcom kc Once you become a ChaseShopcom member youll be entitled to outstanding online offers and digital coupons that are tailored to your individual shopping interests New offers are featured every month And discounts can be redeemed online or offline So take the stress out of holiday shopping Click below to visit ChaseShopcom today kc Happy Holidays Your friends at ChaseShopcom PS Weve just updated the ChaseShopcom site design Now it is even easier to find the gifts youre looking for this holiday season Copyright The Chase Manhattan Bank Corporation All rights reserved The Chase Manhattan Bank Member FDIC ABOUT THIS MESSAGE This message was delivered because you registered to receive updates about the latest offers and services available from Chase We hope you will find these emails a valuable source of information However if you do not wish to receive these email messages from Chase in the future please reply to this email with unsubscribe all in the subject line Please do not reply to this message unless you wish to unsubscribe as the reply function is not equipped to handle inquiries For your convenience you can contact Chase via email by visiting Contact Us on the Chase Home Page kc
